description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Best Party game money can buy! Knock other players out of the 4 different arenas while trying to stay inside! Features 8 Versus modes, gorgeous graphics, wacky powerups, endless customizations... Single and Coop modes included at no extra charge! This indie game has been developed by Milkstone Studios.
